linkToDomain.description: The public domain that generated sites will point to. This is only used in comment url link generation.

internalIPOverride.description: Override the Private IP the script uses. On startup, the script will try to automatically detect what this IP is but can be explicitly set here.

maxConsecutive.description: The maximum number of consecutive preview instances allowed to be open at 1 time. Set to 0 for no limit. Max 1000 (though I STRONGLY suggest you don't use that)

minPort.description: The start of the port range to open web previews on.

maxPort.description: The end of the port range to open web previews on. Must be greater than the min port

instanceOpenHours.description: The number of hours to keep instances open
